rules_text:
First strike
If one or more creature tokens would be created under your control, for each of those tokens, you may create three 2/2 green Cat Warrior creature tokens instead.
notes:
VORTHOS
!rul If you create a noncreature token that will be a creature as it enters the battlefield, perhaps because of an effect such as that of March of the Machines, Timus’s effect doesn’t apply to that token’s creation. (This is because Timus’s effect modifies how the tokens are created, and March of the Machines’s effect doesn't apply until you consider how the tokens are entering the battlefield.)
